short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Bracketwise chrome extension imports your March Madness bracket pool picks into the Bracketwise web application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bracketwise chrome extension imports your March Madness picks into the Bracketwise web application.  
Install the Bracketwise chrome extension, then visit:
https://picks.cbssports.com/college-basketball/ncaa-tournament/bracket/
to pull your picks in.
After your pool's picks have been harvested, visit 
https://bracketwise.app
to view the status of your pool -- and find out who's actually going to win your bracket pool!
